meanings.definition: The state or practice of having only one spouse at a time.
meanings.sent1: In some cultures, hologamies are the norm, with individuals marrying only once.
meanings.sent2: Monogamy, or hologamies, is a common marital arrangement in many societies.
meanings.sent3: John joked that his commitment to hologamies was so strong, he couldn't even imagine having more than one spouse.
meanings.sent4: The idea of hologamies being like a lifelong dance between two partners resonated with Sarah.
meanings.sent5: The concept of hologamies is like a beautiful painting, with each partner adding colors to the canvas of life.

meanings.definition: The state or practice of having more than one spouse at a time.
meanings.sent1: Polygamy involves hologamies, where individuals have multiple spouses simultaneously.
meanings.sent2: In some societies, hologamies are accepted, allowing individuals to have multiple spouses.
meanings.sent3: The idea of hologamies seemed like a complicated juggling act to Mary.
meanings.sent4: The concept of hologamies being like a shared journey with multiple partners intrigued Tom.
meanings.sent5: The image of hologamies is like a tapestry woven with threads of different relationships.
